text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump I like numbers. I have some more:
☠️ 39k deaths
☠️ About 3k more deaths every day, more than 100 an hour!
☠️ About 30k to 50k more reported infections per day
☠️ 1 idiot that wants to open up America in a few days.
Source: https://t.co/oSLfyN6f0U https://t.co/G9yQkcRDBq
